Keep Calm and Manage Stress: Sigala ngoli mukakamu era osobole okufuga ebirowoozo ebingi
This is a stressful time. Take care of y: Kinno ekisera kyakwerarikirira. Werabirire osobole okulabirira abaanabo.
Millions of people have the same fears a: Abantu bangi balina okutya kwekumu nga ffe. Funa omuntu gwosobola okwogera naye ku ngeri gyowulira.
We all need a break sometimes. When your: Ebiseera ebimu ffena tuba twetaga okuwumulamu. Abaanabo bwebaba nga bebase, kolayo ekintu ekikunyumira oba ekikukakanya. Kola olunyiriri lw'ebimu ku bintu by'obulamu bye wandyagade okukola. Kino okigwana!
Be open and listen to your children. You: Beera mulambulukufu a'tera owulirize abaana bo. Abaanabo bagya kukwesigamako okufuna obuwagizi n'obukakafu.
1-minute relaxation activity that you ca: Kino kyoyinza okukola mu dakiika emu buli lw'owulira ebirowoozo ebingi oba okwelalikirira
Find a comfortable sitting position, you: Funa ekiffo wotuula ng'owulirirawo emiremebe, amagulu go ngo gatadde waansi n'emikono gyo kubisaambi byo
Notice your thoughts. Notice if they are: W'etegereze ebirowooza byo. W'etegereze bwebiba nga birungi oba nga bibi
Notice how you feel emotionally. Notice: W'etegereze engeri gyowulira munda. W'etegereze ky'owulira bwoba nga oli musanyufu oba nedda
Notice how your body feels. Notice anyth: W'etegereze engeri omubiri gwo gyeguwuliramu. W'etegereze kyona ekikuluma oba ekikuteeka kubunkenke
Step 3: Focus on your breath: Ekyokusatu; Fayo ku ngeri gyosaamu empewo
Listen to your breath as it goes in and: Wuliriza empeewo gy'ossa nga ojiza munda at'era nga bw'ogifulumya wabweeru.
You can put a hand on your stomach and f: Oyinza okuteeka omukono ku lubuto lwo n'owulira nga bw'ossa.
You may want to say to yourself “It’s ok: Oyinza okwegamba weeka, "kiri bulungi kyonna kyekiri, ndi bulungi."
Then just listen to your breath for a wh: Ddamu owulirize engeri gyosaamu okumala akaseera
We'tegereze engeri omubiri gwo gwonna gye guwuliramu
Bwoba nga omaliriza, zibula amaaso go
Taking a Pause can also be helpful when: Okutwala ekiseera neweyimirizaamu nakyo kyandiba ekyomugaso nadaala bwe wesaanga ng'omwana akumazeeko emirembe oba nga akoze ekintu ekikyaamu. Kino kikuwa omukisa okuba omukakamu. Nokusaa o'kwomunda daala oba okulowooza ku biri waansi kisobola okuteekawo enjawulo. Oyinza okufunna ekiseera ekyo kwewumuzaamu awamu n'omwana wo.
